starters.title: Hier gehts los
starters.description: Hier kannst du anfangen deine erste Webseite zu bauen, bevor es dann mit Web, Android und iOS Apps weitergeht.

web.title: Web development
web.description: Learn how to make things happen on the web, from basic JavaScript to web APIs

react.title: React
react.description: Learn to use one of the most popular JavaScript frameworks out there.

games.title: Games
games.description: Learn to build games, both locally and on the web!

functional_programming.title: Functional Programming with JavaScript
functional_programming.description: Learn the functional programming paradigm in JavaScript with this experimental new series.

python.title: Python
python.description: Learn to use one of the most powerful and beginner-friendly languages.

ml.title: Machine Learning
ml.description: Learn how to make machines learn with these fun projects!

arduino.title: Arduino
arduino.description: Bring projects from cyberspace to the real world with this small hardware platform.

bounties.title: Workshop bounties
bounties.description: Fabulous community-created workshops from the Workshop Bounty program.
